author: Baha'u'llah
source_text:
(٤٢) ﴿ يَا ابْنَ الإِنْسانِ ﴾
كُنْ لِي خاضِعًا لأَكُونَ لَكَ مُتَواضِعًا، وَكُنْ لأَمْري ناصِرًا لِتَكُونَ فِي المُلْكِ مَنْصُورًا.
translation:
(42) O SON OF MAN!
Humble thyself before Me, that I may graciously visit thee. Arise for the triumph of My cause, that while yet on earth thou mayest obtain the victory.
